title: Which would directly increase capital stock

content.question: Which of the following would directly increase the capital stock of an economy?

choices.label: An individual purchases shares of corporate stock.
An individual purchases high-risk corporate bonds.
A business firm expands its production facilities.
A bank uses cash reserves to purchase short-and long-term government securities.
The government implements a spending program to cover prescription drugs for Medicare recipients.

content.answer: A business firm expands its production facilities.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
